metadata.title: CVE-2023-28486 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Sudo before 1.9.13 does not escape control characters in log messages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28486` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.31-1ubuntu1.5
sudo-ldap - 1.8.31-1ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.31-1ubuntu1.5').
